content: after blocking the knitting density is 10cm *10cm corresponds to 24st *36 row i provide instructions for six finished circumferences 42 47 52 57 59cm *i used apmezga yarn aquila 100% merino wool 100g -400m * choose a size that is 6-10cm less than your head circumference * it is more convenient to knit the crown top with 5 dpn needles
